mapper.select:
SELECT SB.*, COUNT(SA.sug_answer_idx) AS sug_answerCount FROM SUG_BOARD SB LEFT JOIN SUG_ANSWER SA ON SB.sug_idx = SA.sug_idx GROUP BY SB.sug_idx HAVING SB.sug_delete = #{param3}
AND COUNT(SA.sug_answer_idx) >= '0'
AND
SB.user_id LIKE '%${param4}%'
SB.sug_title LIKE '%${param4}%'
AND COUNT(SA.sug_answer_idx) = 0
AND
SB.user_id LIKE '%${param4}%'
SB.sug_title LIKE '%${param4}%'
AND COUNT(SA.sug_answer_idx) > 0
AND
SB.user_id LIKE '%${param4}%'
SB.sug_title LIKE '%${param4}%'
ORDER BY SB.sug_idx DESC LIMIT #{param1},#{param2};

sug_title LIKE '%${param3}%'
